short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get a list of suggested YouTube videos, related to the webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TextPlay is designed to enhance your browsing experience by providing you with personalized video recommendations. Whether you are researching a topic or reading an article, TextPlay offers a curated selection of relevant YouTube videos to help you deepen your understanding of the subject matter.

The extension is easy to use and can be installed in seconds. Once installed, TextPlay runs in the background and analyzes the webpage you are on to suggest videos that match the content. TextPlay is perfect for students, researchers, bloggers, and anyone who wants to stay informed and entertained while browsing the web.
